column1: BBC News NI outlines the latest data on coronavirus and Covid-19 vaccinations across Northern Ireland and the Republic of Ireland.Seven Covid-19-related deaths have been reported in Northern Ireland on Tuesday.Deaths are measured by recording those who died within 28 days of receiving a positive result in a test for coronavirus.The total number of deaths linked to Covid-19 in Northern Ireland since the start of the pandemic is 2
column3: 228 cases of coronavirus were reported on Tuesday
